summary: Build a flat Android 6 (Material Design) styled web messaging app for texting friends, with user registration/login, direct messages, and group chats.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Flat Material-style app icon with chat bubble motif (app-icon.dim_512x512.png)
- Subtle flat geometric background pattern in Android 6 Material style (material-bg.dim_1920x1080.png)

existing_features.title: Create an Android 6-inspired flat (Material Design) UI theme and apply it consistently across the app (colors, typography, spacing, surfaces, buttons, inputs, app bars, list items). Use English for all user-facing text.
Implement username/password registration and login, including a frontend auth flow (Register + Login screens), and maintain an authenticated session for subsequent API calls.
Implement direct messages (DM): allow a logged-in user to find/select another user by username and exchange messages in a 1:1 conversation view.
Implement group chats: allow a logged-in user to create a group chat, add members by username, and send/receive messages within the group thread.
Add a chat home layout: left pane (or top tab on narrow screens) showing conversations (DMs and groups) and a main pane for the selected thread, with responsive behavior for mobile and desktop.
Implement message fetching updates without real-time sockets by using periodic polling/refetching and manual refresh controls in the UI.
Generate and include required static image assets (logo/app icon and minimal Android-6-style background) and render them from frontend static assets.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create website UI styled like Android 6 (flat/Material Design)
Implement user authentication: register and login with username and password
Support creating and using group chats
On the backend, store user accounts with secure password handling (salted password hashing) and enforce unique usernames.

projectName: Android 6 (flat Material) web messenger with username/password auth, DMs, and group chats
